ovdesc.p: This table is used to setup amount tokens used in posting lines generated in payments hub.
Amount token refers to payment related amount to be debited or credited and also the amount to be displayed as part of the statement lines.
In case of an outgoing or redirect payment, the transaction amount value can come from different amount tokens depending on the charge option.

desc.p: Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Concatenation of Primary Key Fields (CompanyID, AmountToken).
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created. Identify the Owning Bank.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
